version_description:
Multiplayer - PvP Mode now open
Dark Terra Adventure opened temporarily
Bug and server stability fixes

1.0.6. Update
- Dark Terra Adventure issues fixed
- Arena issues fixed
- Hero skill display and issues fixed
- Other gameplay stability fixes

1.0.10 Update
- New Social Content: Guild
- Revamped Arena
- Various bug fixes

v1.0.12 Update Details
- Official release of Invasion mode
- New packages
- New languages supported (Indonesian and Vietnamese)
- Various bug fixes
